rows.label: tev031101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Noborata about the Ma-non ship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Noborata if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_SEL0031
rows.name:
Ask Noborata for his thoughts on
friendship treaties with xenoforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Noborata if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_SEL0051
rows.name:
Ask Noborata for his thoughts on
friendship treaties with xenoforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Noborata if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_SEL0071
rows.name:
Ask Noborata for his thoughts on
friendship treaties with xenoforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Don't you think the ship feels kind of empty with no
one but Ma-non aboard?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0002
rows.name:
Mira is home to the Nopon and so many other
fascinating xenoforms, is it not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0003
rows.name:
And since we're friends with you and you're friends
with them, doesn't it make sense for them to come live
on our ship?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0004
rows.name:
That would be so stimulating... I just love a good
cross-cultural exchange, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0005
rows.name:
And if the whole reason for our journey was to learn
about as many planets and inhabitants as possible,
then Mira is is basically the mother lode, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0008
rows.name:
Vandham is the large man you all hit yourselves in the
head for, correct? It is true that he's thinking of signing
a friendship treaty with the Nopon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0009
rows.name:
That would be swell, don't you think? Just imagine
New LA swarming with with those walking lunches![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0010
rows.name:
We'd never need to worry about emergency rations
again, you know? What an exciting time to be alive![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0018
rows.name:
That friendship treaty you signed with the Nopon
has changed everything, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0019
rows.name:
Did you know the cute little guys have started living
here on our ship? I even have a new Nopon friend
named Tikotiko.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0020
rows.name:
He's a bit of a tightwad, but he's also quite fun,
if that makes sense? I guess he just makes the ship
a bit more colorful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0021
rows.name:
I hope more species come live here, don't you?
I just love a good cross-cultural exchange...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0022
rows.name:
Heck, the whole reason I came on this journey was to
learn about as many planets and people as possible,
you know? It's all I need to make me happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0025
rows.name:
Did you know that the woman in BLADE Tower
debriefed us about the Prone who attacked us
in Oblivia?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0026
rows.name:
Do you think she's planning to blast them to
smithereens? Or will she hold off and try to rescue
more victims like us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0027
rows.name:
If you're curious, you might want to have a sit-down
with her?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0035
rows.name:
You humans sure are forgiving, aren't you?
You even let the Prone who attacked us live here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0036
rows.name:
But that's okay, you know? I even made friends with
a Prone named Selia![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0037
rows.name:
Besides, she's not violent like those other Prone, okay?
She is kind and very very reliable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0038
rows.name:
In fact, if I stick with her, I think my life might actually
get a bit...easier?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0039
rows.name:
I hope xenoforms from all kinds of planets come to to
our ship so I can make even more friends, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0042
rows.name: Hey, did you hear what I heard?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0043
rows.name:
I guess the insects of Noctilum have undergone some
kind of hyper-evolution that allows them to walk on on
two legs?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0044
rows.name: That's rather terrifying, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0045
rows.name:
Anyway, I was wondering if you might go to Noctilum
and check it out? You know, as a favor? I think BLADE
should get to the bottom of this biological curiosity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0054
rows.name:
Those awful bug-faced Orpheans are in New LA now,
aren't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0055
rows.name:
Please don't tell me you humans signed a friendship
treaty with them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0056
rows.name:
They made all kinds of nasty weapons for for the
Ganglion, you know? I think you're playing with fire![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0057
rows.name:
That's one species I don't really want to to to do a
cultural exchange with, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0062
rows.name:
Did you hear about the Orphean who's been running
around asking what he needs to do to prevent
his extinction?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0069
rows.name: Deep stuff, no? I wish I could give him some pointers...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0070
rows.name:
Say, you seem like you know a lot about not-dying,
right? Maybe you could go talk to him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0071
rows.name:
I think I last saw him in the Ishmael Hills area of
the residential district, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Noborata about materials.

rows.label: tev031101_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Noborata about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0063
rows.name:
The materials I'm dying to get my hands on right now
are upgraded coils, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0072
rows.name:
I need them for these superpowered weapons I'm
building for for our members.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0073
rows.name:
But apparently the only way to get them is to take out
the Ganglion's dangerous oc-servs? Yikes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0074
rows.name:
So basically, the weapon we need to defeat those
things can't be built until we DO defeat those things?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0075
rows.name:
This BLADE stuff is really hard, don't you think?
I suppose I'll have to tough it out one step at a time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0064
rows.name:
If we're all going to join BLADE, then I'll need to
mobilize the giants of Ma-non tech to build some
new, powerful gear for us, won't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0065
rows.name:
Tikotiko can drum up the money and find excuses for
us not to pay it back, I suppose...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0066
rows.name:
And once Selia is armed with our weapons,
we should be pretty much...unbeatable?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0067
rows.name:
I guess maybe my journey across space in search of
alien kindred spirits has finally paid off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031101_MSG0068
rows.name:
My world is a better place now, you know?
How about yours?[ST:wait ]
